title: FS: 1912 T202 Close At Third Tris Speaker Smoky Joe Wood SGC 40 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 T202 Close At Third Tris Speaker Smoky Joe Wood SGC 40 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Very nice card-the white spot on Joe's eye/cheek is from the scanner and not on the card. The price is SOLD delivered pp/ff only please. Thanks for looking.

Joe
